# 6D063-225235 General Construction Services
## Request for Standing Offer

### Solicitation Information

*   **Reference Number:** WS4035734553-Doc4067569317
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4035734553
*   **Publication Date:** November 15, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Notice Information

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Description and Requirements

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a contractor to provide General Construction Services at their facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The contractor will be required to provide skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials necessary for various types of General Construction services. Services are to be provided on an "as required” basis.

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person:** Ullah, Sabieh (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
*   **Email:** [sabieh.ullah@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:sabieh.ullah@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18018135?extsite=MTgwMTgxMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18018135?extsite=MTgwMTgxMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important Dates

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 31, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST
*   **Contract Duration:** Five (5) years

## Screening Requirements

The standing offer will be awarded to one (1) firm and will be valid for a period of five (5) years. Bids must be submitted by December 13, 2023, at 14:00 EST, to be considered responsive. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared nonresponsive.
